title: If you love korea join our club
body:
we are mostly koreans in our club
this is our 2nd club 1st club is full at the moment
we are looking for silver +
older than 19 years old.
we do in house every single day to practice or to improve your skills!!
we have silver to challenger in our club 
so if you need help with duo join our club.
leave a comment with your summoners id, age and tier.
thank you.

replies.body:
What is the club tag for this?

I know you've already stated the conditions for this club but I'll try at least if it's  okay if I'm not even silver at the moment? You can just add me and I'm ok with not having games with anyone. Just being in the club is all that I'm after.
